summary: This document is a summary of monthly charges for an AT&T Wireless account, detailing the billing cycle, current charges, and payment history. It includes information about taxes, surcharges, and various service features. The document emphasizes customer service issues related to high call volumes and provides instructions for electronic fund transfers. This document contains detailed records of voice usage and charges associated with an AT&T Wireless account, including incoming and outgoing calls, their durations, and associated charges. The records span several days in January and February 2004, indicating frequent communication activity, primarily from Palm Beach, Florida. This document details the voice and text message usage for an account associated with the Epstein case, including dates, times, and charges for calls and messages. It provides insights into communication patterns relevant to the investigation.
